languages.text: "Они получают обучение полезным ремеслам, которыми потом послужат династии?" {n}Получив от сенешаля кивок и гримасу, означающую, вероятно, что-то вроде "само собой разумеется", Паскаль делает благословляющий жест.{/n} "Условия содержания и опеки признаны рациональными".

"Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."
languages.original_text: "Они получают обучение полезным ремеслам, которыми потом послужат династии?" {n}Получив от сенешаля кивок и гримасу, означающую, вероятно, что-то вроде "само собой разумеется", Паскаль делает благословляющий жест.{/n} "Условия содержания и опеки признаны рациональными".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らは後々、王朝への奉仕に応用できるような便利な仕事を教えられているのですか？」{n}家令長が肯定的に頷き、また恐らく『明らかに』というようなことを意味するしかめっ面を見せると、パスカルは祝福の身振りをした。{/n}「住宅と手入れの状況は合理的であるとみなされます」
languages.original_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは後々、王朝への奉仕に応用できるような便利な仕事を教えられているのですか？」{n}家令長が肯定的に頷き、また恐らく『明らかに』というようなことを意味するしかめっ面を見せると、パスカルは祝福の身振りをした。{/n}「住宅と手入れの状況は合理的であるとみなされます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “能否为他们传授有用的技能，日后为王朝服务？”{n}对于帕斯卡的问题，阿贝拉德肯定地点头，使了个眼色代表着“肯定可以”。得到答复之后，帕斯卡做了个祝福的手势。{/n}“提供住处与照料是个合理的决定。”
languages.original_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."

traits.locale_text: “能否为他们传授有用的技能，日后为王朝服务？”{n}对于帕斯卡的问题，阿贝拉德肯定地点头，使了个眼色代表着“肯定可以”。得到答复之后，帕斯卡做了个祝福的手势。{/n}“提供住处与照料是个合理的决定。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Leur enseigne-t-on des compétences utiles susceptibles de servir la dynastie à l'avenir ? » {n}Après que le sénéchal a répondu par l'affirmative avec une expression trahissant son impatience devant une question aussi inepte, Pasqal esquisse un geste de bénédiction.{/n} « Leur hébergement et l'éducation qui leur est prodiguée me paraissent en tout point conformes. »
languages.original_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."

traits.locale_text: « Leur enseigne-t-on des compétences utiles susceptibles de servir la dynastie à l'avenir ? » {n}Après que le sénéchal a répondu par l'affirmative avec une expression trahissant son impatience devant une question aussi inepte, Pasqal esquisse un geste de bénédiction.{/n} « Leur hébergement et l'éducation qui leur est prodiguée me paraissent en tout point conformes. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «¿Aprenden profesiones útiles que pueden aplicar al servicio de la dinastía?». {n}El Senescal responde asintiendo con una mueca que probablemente signifique «por supuesto que sí», a lo que Pasqal hace un gesto de bendición.{/n} «Las condiciones de alojamiento y cuidado se consideran racionales».
languages.original_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."

traits.locale_text: «¿Aprenden profesiones útiles que pueden aplicar al servicio de la dinastía?». {n}El Senescal responde asintiendo con una mueca que probablemente signifique «por supuesto que sí», a lo que Pasqal hace un gesto de bendición.{/n} «Las condiciones de alojamiento y cuidado se consideran racionales».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Erlernen sie sinnvolle Berufe, die sie später in Diensten der Dynastie ausüben können?" {n}Nach dem zustimmenden Nicken des Truchsess und einer Geste, die wahrscheinlich so etwas wie "selbstverständlich" heißen soll, macht Pasqal eine Geste der Segnung.{/n} "Unterkunft und Pflegebedingungen schienen angemessen."
languages.original_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."

traits.locale_text: "Erlernen sie sinnvolle Berufe, die sie später in Diensten der Dynastie ausüben können?" {n}Nach dem zustimmenden Nicken des Truchsess und einer Geste, die wahrscheinlich so etwas wie "selbstverständlich" heißen soll, macht Pasqal eine Geste der Segnung.{/n}Unterkunft und Pflegebedingungen schienen angemessen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hanedanlığa hizmette kullanabilecekleri zanaatlar da öğretiliyor mu?" {n}Başını sallayarak onaylayan Seneşal, aynı zamanda hafifçe yüzünü ekşiterek soruyu yersiz bulduğunu gösteriyor. Pasqal ise kutsama hareketi yapıyor.{/n} "Barınma ve bakım şartları yeterli bulundu."
languages.original_text: "Are they taught useful trades they can later apply in the dynasty's service?" {n}After the Seneschal's affirmative nod and a grimace that probably means something like "obviously," Pasqal makes a gesture of blessing.{/n} "Housing and care conditions deemed to be rational."

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlığa hizmet ederken kullanabilecekleri zanaatlar da öğretiliyor mu?" {n}Seneşal onaylamak için başını sallamakla kalmıyor, hafifçe yüzünü ekşitiyor. Soruyu yersiz bulduğunu gösteriyor. Pasqal ise lütuf jestinde bulunuyor.{/n} "Barınma ve bakım şartları yeterli bulundu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
